    145. 
          
          
                class MethodSignature < remove_const(:MethodSignature)
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                private
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  def classify_parameters
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                    super
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                    return unless @method.parameters == [] && @method.arity == 1
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                    @max_non_kw_args = @min_non_kw_args = 1
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                  end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
              end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              # Deals with the slightly different semantics of block arguments.
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              # For methods, arguments are required unless a default value is provided.
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              # For blocks, arguments are optional, even if no default value is provided.
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              #
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              # However, we want to treat block args as required since you virtually
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
              # always want to pass a value for each received argument and our
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              # `and_yield` has treated block args as required for many years.
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              #
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              # @api private
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
              class BlockSignature < MethodSignature
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                if RubyFeatures.optional_and_splat_args_supported?
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
                  def classify_parameters
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                    super
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                    @min_non_kw_args = @max_non_kw_args unless @max_non_kw_args == INFINITY
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                  end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                end
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
              end
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              # Abstract base class for signature verifiers.
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              #
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              # @api private
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
              class MethodSignatureVerifier
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                attr_reader :non_kw_args, :kw_args
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                def initialize(signature, args)
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                  @signature = signature
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                  @non_kw_args, @kw_args = split_args(*args)
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                def valid?
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  missing_kw_args.empty? &&
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                    invalid_kw_args.empty? &&
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                    valid_non_kw_args?
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
                def error_message
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                  if missing_kw_args.any?
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                    "Missing required keyword arguments: %s" % [
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                      missing_kw_args.join(", ")
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                    ]
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                  elsif invalid_kw_args.any?
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                    "Invalid keyword arguments provided: %s" % [
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                      invalid_kw_args.join(", ")
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                    ]
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                  elsif !valid_non_kw_args?
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                    "Wrong number of arguments. Expected %s, got %s." % [
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                      @signature.non_kw_args_arity_description,
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                      non_kw_args.length
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                    ]
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                  end
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                end
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
              private
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                def valid_non_kw_args?
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                  @signature.valid_non_kw_args?(non_kw_args.length)
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
          
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                def missing_kw_args
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                  @signature.missing_kw_args_from(kw_args)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                end
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
          
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
                def invalid_kw_args
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                  @signature.invalid_kw_args_from(kw_args)
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                end
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
          
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
                def split_args(*args)
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                  kw_args = if @signature.has_kw_args_in?(args)
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                              args.pop.keys
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                            else
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                              []
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                            end
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
          
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                  [args, kw_args]
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                end
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
              end
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
          
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
              # Figures out wether a given method can accept various arguments.
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
              # Surprisingly non-trivial.
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
              #
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
              # @private
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
              StrictSignatureVerifier = MethodSignatureVerifier
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
          
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
              # Allows matchers to be used instead of providing keyword arguments. In
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
              # practice, when this happens only the arity of the method is verified.
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
              #
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
              # @private
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
              class LooseSignatureVerifier < MethodSignatureVerifier
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
              private
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
          
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                def split_args(*args)
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
                  if RSpec::Support.is_a_matcher?(args.last) && @signature.could_contain_kw_args?(args)
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                    args.pop
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
                    @signature = SignatureWithKeywordArgumentsMatcher.new(@signature)
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
                  end
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
          
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
                  super(*args)
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
                end
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                # If a matcher is used in a signature in place of keyword arguments, all
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
                # keyword argument validation needs to be skipped since the matcher is
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
                # opaque.
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
                #
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
                # Instead, keyword arguments will be validated when the method is called
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
                # and they are actually known.
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
                #
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
                # @private
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
                class SignatureWithKeywordArgumentsMatcher
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
                  def initialize(signature)
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
                    @signature = signature
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
                  end
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
          
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
                  def missing_kw_args_from(_kw_args)
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
                    []
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
                  end
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
          
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
                  def invalid_kw_args_from(_kw_args)
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
                    []
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
                  end
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
          
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
                  def non_kw_args_arity_description
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
                    @signature.non_kw_args_arity_description
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
                  end
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
                  def valid_non_kw_args?(*args)
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
                    @signature.valid_non_kw_args?(*args)
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                  end
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
          
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
                  def has_kw_args_in?(args)
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                    @signature.has_kw_args_in?(args)
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
                  end
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
                end
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
              end
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
            end
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
          end
        
      291.

    path/gems/rspec-support-3.4.1/lib/rspec/support/object_formatter.rb

    39.53 % covered

    43 relevant lines. 17 lines covered and 26 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          module RSpec
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            module Support
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              # Provide additional output details beyond what `inspect` provides when
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              # printing Time, DateTime, or BigDecimal
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
              module ObjectFormatter
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                # @api private
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
                def self.format(object)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                  prepare_for_inspection(object).inspect
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                end
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                # rubocop:disable MethodLength
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                # @private
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                # Prepares the provided object to be formatted by wrapping it as needed
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                # in something that, when `inspect` is called on it, will produce the
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                # desired output.
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                #
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                # This allows us to apply the desired formatting to hash/array data structures
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                # at any level of nesting, simply by walking that structure and replacing items
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                # with custom items that have `inspect` defined to return the desired output
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                # for that item. Then we can just use `Array#inspect` or `Hash#inspect` to
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                # format the entire thing.
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                def self.prepare_for_inspection(object)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                  case object
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                  when Array
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                    return object.map { |o| prepare_for_inspection(o) }
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  when Hash
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                    return prepare_hash(object)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  when Time
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                    inspection = format_time(object)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                  else
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    if defined?(DateTime) && DateTime === object
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                      inspection = format_date_time(object)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                    elsif defined?(BigDecimal) && BigDecimal === object
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                      inspection = "#{object.to_s 'F'} (#{object.inspect})"
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                    elsif RSpec::Support.is_a_matcher?(object) && object.respond_to?(:description)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                      inspection = object.description
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    else
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                      return DelegatingInspector.new(object)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  InspectableItem.new(inspection)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                # rubocop:enable MethodLength
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                # @private
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                def self.prepare_hash(input)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  input.inject({}) do |hash, (k, v)|
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    hash[prepare_for_inspection(k)] = prepare_for_inspection(v)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                    hash
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                  end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                TIME_FORMAT = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                if Time.method_defined?(:nsec)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                  # @private
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  def self.format_time(time)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                    time.strftime("#{TIME_FORMAT}.#{"%09d" % time.nsec} %z")
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                else # for 1.8.7
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                  # @private
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                  def self.format_time(time)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    time.strftime("#{TIME_FORMAT}.#{"%06d" % time.usec} %z")
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
                DATE_TIME_FORMAT = "%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S.%N %z"
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                # ActiveSupport sometimes overrides inspect. If `ActiveSupport` is
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                # defined use a custom format string that includes more time precision.
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                # @private
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                def self.format_date_time(date_time)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                  if defined?(ActiveSupport)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    date_time.strftime(DATE_TIME_FORMAT)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                  else
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    date_time.inspect
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                # @private
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                InspectableItem = Struct.new(:inspection) do
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  def inspect
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    inspection
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                  end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                  def pretty_print(pp)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    pp.text inspection
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                  end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                # @private
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                DelegatingInspector = Struct.new(:object) do
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                  def inspect
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                    if defined?(::Delegator) && ::Delegator === object
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                      "#<#{object.class}(#{ObjectFormatter.format(object.__getobj__)})>"
        
      97. 
      
        
    97.

      98.

      99.

    path/gems/tilt-2.0.2/lib/tilt/erb.rb

    88.0 % covered

    25 relevant lines. 22 lines covered and 3 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'tilt/template'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
          require 'erb'
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
          module Tilt
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # ERB template implementation. See:
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            # http://www.ruby-doc.org/stdlib/libdoc/erb/rdoc/classes/ERB.html
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
            class ERBTemplate < Template
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
              @@default_output_variable = '_erbout'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
              def self.default_output_variable
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                @@default_output_variable
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              def self.default_output_variable=(name)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                warn "#{self}.default_output_variable= has been replaced with the :outvar-option"
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                @@default_output_variable = name
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
              def prepare
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          15
          
                @outvar = options[:outvar] || self.class.default_output_variable
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          15
          
                options[:trim] = '<>' if !(options[:trim] == false) && (options[:trim].nil? || options[:trim] == true)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          15
          
                @engine = ::ERB.new(data, options[:safe], options[:trim], @outvar)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
              def precompiled_template(locals)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          15
          
                source = @engine.src
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          15
          
                source
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
              def precompiled_preamble(locals)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                <<-RUBY
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          15
          
                    __original_outvar = #{@outvar} if defined?(#{@outvar})
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                    #{super}
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                RUBY
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
              def precompiled_postamble(locals)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                <<-RUBY
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          15
          
                    #{super}
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    #{@outvar} = __original_outvar
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                RUBY
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              # ERB generates a line to specify the character coding of the generated
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              # source in 1.9. Account for this in the line offset.
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
              if RUBY_VERSION >= '1.9.0'
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                def precompiled(locals)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          15
          
                  source, offset = super
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          15
          
                  [source, offset + 1]
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
            end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58.

    path/gems/tilt-2.0.2/lib/tilt/erubis.rb

    11.11 % covered

    18 relevant lines. 2 lines covered and 16 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'tilt/erb'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
          require 'erubis'
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          module Tilt
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # Erubis template implementation. See:
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            # http://www.kuwata-lab.com/erubis/
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            #
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            # ErubisTemplate supports the following additional options, which are not
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            # passed down to the Erubis engine:
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            #
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            #   :engine_class   allows you to specify a custom engine class to use
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            #                   instead of the default (which is ::Erubis::Eruby).
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
            #
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            #   :escape_html    when true, ::Erubis::EscapedEruby will be used as
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
            #                   the engine class instead of the default. All content
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
            #                   within <%= %> blocks will be automatically html escaped.
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            class ErubisTemplate < ERBTemplate
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              def prepare
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                @outvar = options.delete(:outvar) || self.class.default_output_variable
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                @options.merge!(:preamble => false, :postamble => false, :bufvar => @outvar)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                engine_class = options.delete(:engine_class)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                engine_class = ::Erubis::EscapedEruby if options.delete(:escape_html)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                @engine = (engine_class || ::Erubis::Eruby).new(data, options)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              def precompiled_preamble(locals)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                [super, "#{@outvar} = _buf = ''"].join("\n")
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              def precompiled_postamble(locals)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                [@outvar, super].join("\n")
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              # Erubis doesn't have ERB's line-off-by-one under 1.9 problem.
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              # Override and adjust back.
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              if RUBY_VERSION >= '1.9.0'
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                def precompiled(locals)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  source, offset = super
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  [source, offset - 1]
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
            end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          end
        
      44.

            it 'generate version' do
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
              wiki = create(:wiki, user: create(:user))
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
              wiki2 = create(:wiki, title: wiki.title, user: wiki.user)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
              expect(wiki2.version).to eq 2
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          end
        
      13.
